price: Bã zã su iya yin wasiyya* ba, kuma bã zã su iya kõmãwa zuwa ga iyãlansu ba.
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: * Mãsu izgili ga addini idan ajali ya je musu bisa ga abke, bã zã a bã su dãmar wasiyya ba ga iyãlansu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
